snippet: The Russian account contradicted statements by senior State Department officials this week that Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani had violated a travel ban.
abstract: Russian Foreign Ministry denies United States reports that Iranian Maj Gen Qassim Suleimani visited Moscow at end of July, despite travel ban placed on Suleimani by United Nations.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The Russian account contradicted statements by senior State Department officials this week that Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani had violated a travel ban.

headline.main: Russia Denies Reports of Iranian General’s Visit to Moscow
headline.print_headline: Russia Denies U.S. Report That Iranian General Visited Moscow
